This template is designed to facilitate the monthly processing and harmonization of Protected data. It includes steps for initializing the environment, creating and managing Delta tables, and inserting data into harmonized tables. The template ensures that Protected data is accurately transformed, stored, and made available for reporting and analysis.

    ,CURRENT_DATE() AS IngestionDate

from odw_standardised_db.sap_protected_monthly

UPDATE odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
SET RowID = md5(
    concat_ws('|',
	   RefNo
      ,EthnicOrigin
      ,ReligiousDenominationKey
      ,SxO
      ,Grade
      ,DisabilityText
      )

%%sql

WITH pc AS (
    SELECT 
        Report_MonthEnd_Date,
        COUNT(*) AS s_count
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
    WHERE RefNo IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY Report_MonthEnd_Date
),
x2 AS (
    SELECT 
       cast(to_timestamp(Report_MonthEnd_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy") as date) as Report_MonthEnd_Date, 
        COUNT(*) AS history_rows
    FROM 
        odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR h 
    WHERE 
        left(Report_MonthEnd_Date,7) > '2019-03' 
        AND h.PayrollArea = 'PINS'
    GROUP BY 
        Report_MonthEnd_Date
),
to_delete AS (
    SELECT pc.Report_MonthEnd_Date
    FROM pc 
    INNER JOIN x2 
        ON pc.Report_MonthEnd_Date = x2.Report_MonthEnd_Date
    WHERE pc.s_count = x2.history_rows
),
source_data AS (
    SELECT 
        SAP_HR_PC.*,
        CASE 
            WHEN to_delete.Report_MonthEnd_Date IS NOT NULL THEN 'DELETE'
            ELSE 'INSERT'
        END AS action
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
    LEFT JOIN to_delete 
        ON SAP_HR_PC.Report_MonthEnd_Date = to_delete.Report_MonthEnd_Date
),
deduplicated_source AS (
    SELECT 
        *,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY Report_MonthEnd_Date ORDER BY RefNo) AS row_num
    FROM source_data
)
-- Use MERGE to delete and insert rows
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_protected_data AS target
USING (
    SELECT * 
    FROM deduplicated_source 
    WHERE row_num = 1 -- Ensure only one row per Report_MonthEnd_Date
) AS source
ON target.Report_MonthEnd_Date = source.Report_MonthEnd_Date
WHEN MATCHED AND source.action = 'DELETE' THEN DELETE
WHEN NOT MATCHED AND source.action = 'INSERT' THEN INSERT *;

%%sql

    concat_ws('|',
	   RefNo
      ,EthnicOrigin

      )

%%sql
delete from odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_protected_data;

INSERT into odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_protected_data
select
	   RefNumber   as RefNo
      ,Ethnicorigin as EthnicOrigin
      ,ReligiousDenominationKey
      ,SxO
      ,Grade
      ,DisabilityText
      ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(RIGHT(REPLACE(file_name, '.xlsx', ''), 8), '_', '-'), 'yyyyMMdd') as Report_MonthEnd_Date
      ,'saphr'  as SourceSystemID
      ,current_date() as IngestionDate
      ,current_timestamp() as ValidTo
      ,null as RowID
      ,'Y' as IsActive
 from 
odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_protected_data_hist ;

%%sql

-- First, ensure SAP_HR_PC is properly formatted with dates
WITH source_data AS (
    SELECT 
        RefNo,
        NULLIF(EthnicOrigin, '') AS EthnicOrigin,
        NULLIF(ReligiousDenominationKey, '') AS ReligiousDenominationKey,
        NULLIF(SxO, '') AS SxO,
        Grade,
        NULLIF(DisabilityText, '') AS DisabilityText,
        cast(to_timestamp(Report_MonthEnd_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy") as date) AS Report_MonthEnd_Date,
        'saphr' AS SourceSystemID,
        CURRENT_DATE() AS IngestionDate,
        CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS ValidTo,
        NULL AS RowID,
        'Y' AS IsActive,
        -- Calculate hash in the source directly
        md5(concat(
            coalesce(RefNo, ''),
            coalesce(NULLIF(EthnicOrigin, ''), ''),
            coalesce(NULLIF(ReligiousDenominationKey, ''), ''),
            coalesce(NULLIF(SxO, ''), ''),
            coalesce(Grade, ''),
            coalesce(NULLIF(DisabilityText, ''), '')
        )) AS record_hash
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
),
-- Deduplicate source data to ensure only one row per key
deduplicated_source AS (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
               PARTITION BY RefNo, Report_MonthEnd_Date 
               ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC
           ) AS row_num
    FROM source_data
)

-- Use MERGE with deduplicated source
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_protected_data target
USING (SELECT * FROM deduplicated_source WHERE row_num = 1) source
ON source.RefNo = target.RefNo AND source.Report_MonthEnd_Date = target.Report_MonthEnd_Date
WHEN MATCHED AND 
     md5(concat(
        coalesce(target.RefNo, ''),
        coalesce(target.EthnicOrigin, ''),
        coalesce(target.ReligiousDenominationKey, ''),
        coalesce(target.SxO, ''),
        coalesce(target.Grade, ''),
        coalesce(target.DisabilityText, '')
     )) != source.record_hash 
THEN UPDATE SET
    EthnicOrigin = source.EthnicOrigin,
    ReligiousDenominationKey = source.ReligiousDenominationKey,
    SxO = source.SxO,
    Grade = source.Grade,
    DisabilityText = source.DisabilityText,
    SourceSystemID = source.SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate = source.IngestionDate,
    ValidTo = source.ValidTo,
    IsActive = source.IsActive
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (
    RefNo, EthnicOrigin, ReligiousDenominationKey, SxO, Grade, 
    DisabilityText, Report_MonthEnd_Date, SourceSystemID, 
    IngestionDate, ValidTo, RowID, IsActive
)
VALUES (
    source.RefNo, source.EthnicOrigin, source.ReligiousDenominationKey, 
    source.SxO, source.Grade, source.DisabilityText, source.Report_MonthEnd_Date, 
    source.SourceSystemID, source.IngestionDate, source.ValidTo, 
    source.RowID, source.IsActive
